Every time a child is born, it's different than both parents. That's evolution. Change. Are you suggesting some mythological god had a role, or are you you a little more advanced and understand how human reproduction works on a basic level?
Bacteria, a better example, can actually swap genetic material, and "evolve" rapidly, without even needing to go through a sexual reproductive cycle.
Just do a simple web search and I'm sure you'll learn some science..i.e. facts about reality.
